BootstrapArticle.Title: OpenCms Introduction: Step 3 - Link to Step 4

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The images above provide a quick intro to using the sitemap editor. In the sitemap editor, you can move existing pages around or create new pages by drag and drop, similar to editing content.

Go ahead and try the sitemap editor. Afterwards, come back and continue the introduction tour with the device preview.

Link.Text: Continue with step 4: Preview in a device
